Title: A Right Proper Story
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Franklin Hardy, Shane Kosakowski, Eva Anderson (executive story editor), Alison Bennett (executive story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy's trashy family comes to visit from England, much to Jimmy and Gretchen's dismay. Lindsay finds herself with a job for the day. Edgar bonds with Jimmy's little sister.
